title: Tata Motors to increase prices of its PVs from Feb 1
description: Tata Motors announces price hike across models, including Electric Vehicles (EVs), effective from February 1, 2024, to partially offset the rise in input costs. The company plans to increase prices by 0.7% on average. Earlier, Tata Motors had already announced a price hike for its commercial vehicle models to offset the residual impact of past input costs.
